description.en: The course is aimed at future teachers, school psychologists and special educational needs teachers. Theoretical basis for working with children with SEN. Identifying and describing children with SEN. The role of a classroom teacher, psychologist and SEN teacher in helping children with SEN. Analysing the problems of a particular child and devising an individual support plan for him/her.
description.et: Kursuse käigus antakse teoreetilised teadmised tööks HEV lastega, kirjeldatakse HEV lapsi, nende hindamise ning abistamise võimalusi õpetaja, psühholoogi ja eripedagoogi vaatenurgast. Analüüsitakse probleeme näidisjuhtumite abil ning koostatakse abistamise kavad.

objectives.en: To acquire practical knowledge and skills for working with children with special educational needs at school. To get to know the peculiarities of the work of a school psychologist, special educational needs and classroom teacher.
objectives.et: Ainekursuse eesmärk on tutvustada üliõpilastele hariduslike erivajaduste olemust, liike ning HEV laste abistamise põhilisi võimalusi koolis ning koostöös spetsialistidega koolis ning väljaspool kooli.

learning_outcomes.en: On completion of the course, students should be able to demonstrate thorough understanding of special educational needs and the most common areas of disability; use appropriate methods to support the development of children, meet their individual needs; know different support systems; co-operate and communicate effectively with colleagues and other specialists.
learning_outcomes.et: Õppeaine läbinud üliõpilane: teab HEV olemust ning enamesinevaid liike; oskab leida sobivaid viise lapse arengu toetamiseks ning õppetöö individualiseerimiseks ning koostada vastavaid plaane; on teadlik erinevate spetsialistide võimalustest HEV lapse abistamisel ning väärtustab meeskonnatööd.
